text: Ara ora allah‌ke chere diye tara upasana kare ya tadera kono ksati karate pare na ba tadera upakara'o karate pare na, ara tara bale -- ''era amadera jan'ya allah‌ra kache suparisakari.’’ Balo -- ''tomara ki allah‌ke janate ca'o ya tini janena na mahakase ara prthibite'o na?’’ Tarami saba mahima! Ara tara yake ansi kare ta hate tini bahu urdhbe.
